message.heading: Oh. One other thing. If you guys ever have kids, and one of them, when he's eight years old, accidentally sets fire to the living room rug... go easy on him.

message.heading: He's an absolute dream!

message.heading: My equipment. That reminds me, Marty. You better not hook up to the amplifier. There's a slight possibility of overload.
